"Giruva Diversion Trials":
"During Halpha Environmental Experiment Zone Exploration, you may encounter a special enemy called Giruva. Giruva targets a specific player and pursues them relentlessly.

Giruva's attacks are very powerful, so if you find yourself being targeted by one, try to keep your distance or run away."

"Giruva cannot be damaged by normal attacks. To defeat it, you must first destroy all of the Giruva Cores which appear alongside it, then use a special weapon called a Repulse Wedge.

Defeating a Giruva will award you powerful Buffs."
